[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_python_file returned: Error: File '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/send_tweet.py' does not exist."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "send_tweet.py", "text": "import tweepy\\n\\n# Load Twitter API credentials\\nwith open(\'.twitter_keys\', \'r\') as f:\\n    keys = f.read().splitlines()\\n    consumer_key = keys[0]\\n    consumer_secret = keys[1]\\n    access_token = keys[2]\\n    access_token_secret = keys[3]\\n\\n# Authenticate API credentials\\nauth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)\\nauth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)\\n\\n# Create API object\\napi = tweepy.API(auth)\\n\\n# Send tweet\\ntweet_text = \\"@InstitutoHemingway Hi, I\'m interested in learning more about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. Can you provide more information?\\"\\napi.update_status(tweet_text)\\nprint(\'Tweet sent successfully!\')"}}}'}]
